keyPolicies.policyDescription: Getting on with the job of Brexit; a Brexit deal which works for Britain and allows us to seize new opportunities.

mentions.candidate: Theresa May needs your support to continue her plan for a stronger Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May's plan for Brexit is to get the right deal for Britain. She will fight to secure the best possible deal which facilitates a new positive role for the UK in the world.

leaflet.personalStatement: Theresa May's personal statement focuses on strong and stable leadership in the national interest.

politicalExperience.achievements: Theresa May has brought strength and stability as Prime Minister.

quotes.text: Every vote for me and local Conservatives will strengthen my hand in the Brexit negotiations.

images.caption: Photo of Theresa May with caption: STRONG LEADERSHIP. A CLEAR ECONOMIC PLAN. A BRIGHTER, MORE SECURE FUTURE.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contrasts Theresa May as a strong leader versus the coalition of chaos under Jeremy Corbyn.
